Record.ClassificationPath: Cardiovascular Diseases/Heart Diseases/Ventricular Outflow Obstruction/Aortic Valve Stenosis/Aortic Stenosis, Supravalvular
Cardiovascular Diseases/Heart Diseases/Heart Valve Diseases/Aortic Valve Stenosis/Aortic Stenosis, Supravalvular
Record.Description: A pathological constriction occurring in the region above the AORTIC VALVE. It is characterized by restricted outflow from the LEFT VENTRICLE into the AORTA.
